purpleculture_examples:
伶俐 [ líng lì ]: clever; witty; intelligent
优伶 [ yōu líng ]: (old) performing artist; actor; actress
孤苦伶仃 [ gū kǔ líng dīng ]: solitary and impoverished (idiom)
伶牙俐齿 [ líng yá lì chǐ ]: clever and eloquent (idiom); fluent; having the gift of the gab
伶仃 [ líng dīng ]: alone and helpless; also written 零丁

heisig_chinese_memo: Mr. T orders his favorite actor to make a comedy movie next even though he only does action movies.

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Mr. T orders his favorite actor to make a comedy movie next even though he only does action movies.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " person ", " ling " sound, the name of ancient music official. Tang Mengjiao "Song of Jiaofang": "Last year, at Xijing Temple, the actor gathered to give a feast."

" Ling " also refers to the actor. Such as "youling", "jialing", "famous acting", "actress" and other words " ling ", all use this meaning.

" Ling " also refers to a servant, that is, a person who is called for. Tang Bai Juyi's "Fu Zhai Feels the Dream of Rewarding": "Fu Actors are calling for the first to arrive, and the family is ready to help."

" Ling " also means teasing. "Shuowen": "Ling, Nong Ye. Congren, Lingsheng. Yizhou has Jianling County."
humanum_short_description_en: From " person ", " ling " sound, the name of ancient music official.
humanum_full_description:
從「人」，「令」聲，古代樂官之名。唐孟郊〈教坊歌兒〉：「去年西京寺，眾伶集講筵。」

　　「伶」也泛指演員。如「優伶」、「家伶」、「名伶」、「女伶」等詞中之「伶」，皆用此義。

　　「伶」還指廝役，即供使喚者。唐白居易〈府齋感懷酬夢得〉：「府伶呼喚爭先到，家醞提攜動輒隨。」

　　「伶」亦表示戲弄。《說文》：「伶，弄也。从人，令聲。益州有建伶縣。」
humanum_short_description: 從「人」，「令」聲，古代樂官之名。

從「 人 」，「 令 」聲，古代樂官之名。唐孟郊〈教坊歌兒〉：「去年西京寺，眾伶集講筵。」 「 伶 」也泛指演員。如「優伶」、「家伶」、「名伶」、「女伶」等詞中之「 伶 」，皆用此義。 「 伶 」還指廝役，即供使喚者。唐白居易〈府齋感懷酬夢得〉：「府伶呼喚爭先到，家醞提攜動輒隨。」 「 伶 」亦表示戲弄。《說文》：「伶，弄也。从人，令聲。益州有建伶縣。」
From " person", " ling" sound, the name of ancient music official. Tang Mengjiao "Song of Jiaofang": "Last year, at Xijing Temple, the actor gathered to give a feast." " Ling" also refers to the actor. Such as "youling", "jialing", "famous acting", "actress" and other words " ling", all use this meaning. " Ling" also refers to a servant, that is, a person who is called for. Tang Bai Juyi's "Fu Zhai Feels the Dream of Rewarding": "Fu Actors are calling for the first to arrive, and the family is ready to help." " Ling" also means teasing. "Shuowen": "Ling, Nong Ye. Congren, Lingsheng. Yizhou has Jianling County."

伶字的基本解释

伶
líng
〔伶仃〕孤独。
〔伶俐〕聪明；灵活。
〔伶俜〕孤独的样子。
旧时称以演戏为职业的人：优伶。名伶。伶官（古代乐官）。

伶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［líng］
［《廣韻》郎丁切，平青，來。］
(1)古乐官名。相传黄帝时有伶伦，世掌乐官。又，春秋时周有司乐官伶州鸠，见《国语·周语下》。后因称乐官、乐人为“伶”。
(2)旧泛指演员。
(3)使唤。
(4)指厮役，供使唤者。
(5)见“伶俐”。
(6)见“伶俜”。
(7)见“伶仃”。
(8)见“伶伶”。
(9)姓。汉代有伶徵。

伶字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　伶； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页97第03
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?郞丁切，音零。獨也。　又弄也。伶人，弄臣也。　又伶人，樂工也。伶倫，古樂師，世掌樂官，故號樂官爲伶官。　又【唐樂府序】伯牙作水伶操。　又使也。厮役謂之使伶。　又健伶，縣名，屬益州郡。　又伶俐，黠慧也。　又伶仃，與彾㣔同。伶俜，與竛?同。　又【集韻】郞定切，音笭。又力正切，音令。義?同。

伶字的源字形

伶字的起名意思

：指聪明；灵活；旧时称以演戏为职业的人。

Actor
Basic explanation of words
Actor
líng
[Lingding] Lonely.
[Smart] Smart; flexible.
[Ling Ling] Looks lonely.
People who used to call acting as a profession: actresses. Celebrities. Acting officer (ancient music officer).
Actor
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［líng］
["Guangyun" Lang Dingqie, Pingqing, come. ]
(1) Official name of ancient music. According to legend, Huangdi always had a talented person and a music official in the world. Also, in the Spring and Autumn Period, there was a Solo Officer Ling Zhoujiu, see "Mandarin · Zhou Yuxia". Later, it was called "Ling Guan" and "Ling Ren".
(2) The old generally refers to actors.
(3) Call.
(4) Refers to the servants, for the caller.
(5) See "smart".
(6) See "Ling Tu".
(7) See "Lingding".
(8) See "Ling Ling".
(9) Last name. There was an actor sign in the Han Dynasty.
Actor
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　伶; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 97 Page 03
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Yin Ding cut, sound zero. Alone too.　 Make it again. Actresses, jesters too.　It's also an actor and a musician. Ling Lun, ancient music master, music official of the world, so the title of music official is the acting official.　[Tang Yuefu Preface] Boya is a water performer.　 Make it again. The servant is called the actor.　Yu Jian Ling, the name of the county, belongs to Yizhou County.　Also smart, and Hui Hui.　Also Lingding, same as 彾㣔. Ling Ling, same as Ling?　[Jiyun] Yun Dingqie, sound 笭. And force the tangent, the sound order. Righteous? Same.

善巧言、悦色,令人开心。本义指古代的乐官、乐师。

伶
líng
伶|伶
“j a巴 13
Пиктофонетические символы.
Люди (イ) выражают значение, что означает человека, который выступает в качестве музыкального чиновника или музыканта; Лин (hng) выражает голос и придает значение Lingyan (Qiaoyan) и Ling Se (счастливый звук), что означает, что исполнитель умело и приятно. Это весело.
Первоначальное значение относится к древним музыкальным чиновникам и музыкантам.
D имел обыкновение относиться к оперным актерам: ~ имена людей ~ "кун ~. 2 Умный; умный: ~ зубы и зубы (для описания способности хорошо говорить).
~ Син ~ Ли ~ Знаменитый ~ Отличный ~ Одинокий ~ Одинокий ~ Ли
